alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Burke, southeastern Richmond, west central Calhoun, northern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, southeastern Lexington, southern Aiken and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williston, or 13 miles north of Barnwell, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Savannah River Site, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Jackson, McBean, Aiken State Park, Swansea, North, Springfield, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Perry, Elko, Woodford, Livingston, Windsor and Savannah River Site Badge Office. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Georgia...and central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg
